name: Bones (Vicarious)
description:
Match the bone displayed in the lower left corner of the screen.

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Click on the * button to show the game options.
  • Click on the ? button to show the help usage.
  • Click on the - and + buttons to zoom in and out (in the "bone to find" viewport).
  • Click on the < and > buttons to select the previous and next  "bone to find".

KNOWN ISSUES

  • The discs and teeth are not split individually
  • The pubis mesh is missing the right side
  • The bone index display isn't updated when there's only one bone remaining

CREDITS

  • free3d.com - Base mesh for the skeleton
  • tileable.co - Bone texture
